name: Evo Planet
description:
Eat smaller creatures to gain mass. Evolve into different creatures that owns their own special abilities. Right now, you can unlock 21 evolutions and more are coming soon!

You can find the list of the 21 evolutions below:

👀 Single Cell
👀 Tadpole
👀 Froglet
🐸 Frog
🦎 Lizard
🐍 Snake
🐢 Turtle
🐜 Ant
🕷️ Spider
🦂 Scorpion
🦞 Lobster
🐛 Worm
🐛 Caterpillar
🐛 Larva
🐌 Snail
👀 Pupa
👀 Cocoon
🦀 Crab
🐝 Bee
🐝 Wasp
🦋 Butterfly

Controls:

Use WASD or the mouse to move.
